title: PFL 2019, Playoffs 1 weigh-in results: All clear to start post-season
text:
Gallery Photos: PFL 2019, Playoffs 1 ceremonial weigh-ins, faceoffs view 24 images

The PFL’s first playoff event is set, and the post-season contestants in the welterweight and women’s lightweight division made weight without issue.

PFL 2019, Playoffs 1 takes place Friday at Mandalay Bay Events Center in Las Vegas. The nights prelims stream on ESPN+, while the main card airs on ESPN2.

Thursday, the eight-man welterweight field, as well as the four women involved in the women’s lightweight playoffs, all made weight without issue.

The men’s competitors will look to fight twice in a single night and earn their way to the PFL 2019 Championship, which takes place Dec. 31, where playoff winners will take home $1 million prizes.

Meanwhile, the female competitors have already been narrowed to four and will need to compete just once on Friday to earn their finals ticket.

The PFL 2019, Playoffs 1 weigh-in results include:

MAIN CARD (ESPN2, 10 p.m. ET)

PRELIMINARY CARD (ESPN+, 8 p.m. ET)
description: The PFL's first playoff event is set, and the contestants in the welterweight and women's lightweight division made weight without issue.
